title: Cycling Plus’ Tour de France edition on sale now with two pull-out guides
content:
The Summer 2023 edition of Cycling Plus is out now. And it’s a biggie, coming with pull-out guides to the Tour de France men’s and Femmes races, with all you need to know on the teams, stages and talking points of 2023’s biggest cycling races.

If you subscribe today you’ll get a Cube bike helmet worth £50 and save 33 per cent.

Tour de France 2023

The start of the world’s biggest bike race is very, very nearly upon us. But what are the key stages, the teams on the start line and the areas in which the Tour de France will be won and lost?

Cycling Plus‘ 36-page pull-out guide will answer your questions, plus much more, including the team’s picks of the greatest climbs in the race’s history

Tour de France Femmes 2023

After 2022’s massively successful edition, the Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift is set to return in July. An extensive 28-page guide boasts exclusive interviews with British star Lizzie Deignan and event director Marion Rousse, plus a debate on the race’s major talking points and the key stage, rider and team details.

The big bike test

Want to hit the gravel and ride it fast? Then you’re in luck, as Warren Rossiter reviews four of the swiftest multi-terrain flyers from Specialized, Orbea, Focus and Basso in this issue’s major bike test.

Summer kit rated

In the market for a new summer outfit? Cycling Plus rates 12 men’s and women’s jersey and bib-short combos for their performance in the heat, comfort, carrying capacities and more.

Mental recovery

How can we combat the psychological comedown from crossing the line of that major cycling challenge? Anna Gardiner investigates, while a host of experts provide their proven methods to help you think like a champion.

Top ‘takeaway’ recipes

From nutrient-dense curries to veggie-packed pizzas, even pro riders now get to enjoy healthy twists on takeaway treats, We reveal how naughty but nutritious ‘takeaway’ food can satisfy your cravings and boost your performance.

Island escapes

Tired of crowded Mallorca or toasty Tenerife? We present our best under-the-radar island destinations for 2023 and beyond, including Madeira, the Azores, Ibiza and Guernsey.

Subscription offer

Whether you’re looking at investing in a new bike, trying a different kind of cycling or searching for new gear to make those days on the road more comfortable, Cycling Plus is the magazine for you.

You’ll find inspiring features from across the UK and around the world on every page, plus interviews with the movers and shakers in cycling.

Remember, subscribe today to save 33 per cent on the shop price and get a Cube helmet with £50.

Otherwise, check out the Cycling Plus Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts for all of the latest news from the magazine team.
